properties.name: gateway.filter.cache-user-timeout
properties.description: 单个用户的缓存有效期。单位毫秒

properties.name: gateway.filter.global-request-rate-count
properties.description: 全局限流器每秒钟产生的令牌数

properties.name: gateway.filter.user-request-rate-count
properties.description: 单个用户限流器每秒产生的令牌数

properties.name: gateway.filter.white-request-uri
properties.description: 请求权限验证白名单(白名单内的uri无需进行token验证)
